title: Funding Autism Research
description: A hearing was held on progress made since the subcommittee's April 17, 2007, hearing on autism. Dr. Insel talked about autism research initiatives the the National Institutes of Health and various statistical analyses associated with research. He was followed by a panel of parents who testified about their experiences with autistic children and treatments for the disease.
